body:
Hello WhatsApp Support,

My WhatsApp account number {no} has been permanently banned. I strongly believe this action was taken by mistake.

Please review my account and help restore access.

Thank you.

Dear WhatsApp Team,

I would like to request a reconsideration regarding the permanent ban on my WhatsApp number {no}.

I have not knowingly violated any policies.

Kind regards.

Hello,

My WhatsApp account {no} has been permanently disabled. I respectfully request a manual review of my account.

Thank you for your time.
